messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper?
The ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper is a custom node or plugin that extends the functionality of ComfyUI by integrating camera control features using the CameraCtrl model weights.
What are the three model weights required for the ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper workflow?
The three model weights required for the ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper workflow are: CameraCtrl.ckpt, v3_adapter_sd_v15.ckpt, and v3_sd15_mm.ckpt.ckpt.
Where should the CameraCtrl.ckpt file be placed in the ComfyUI directory structure?
The CameraCtrl.ckpt file should be placed in the ComfyUI/models/checkpoints directory.
What is the purpose of the v3_adapter_sd_v15.ckpt file in the ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper workflow?
The v3_adapter_sd_v15.ckpt file is an AD V3 Adapter model weight used in the ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper workflow to enhance the camera control features.
What is the size of the v3_sd15_mm.ckpt.ckpt file?
The v3_sd15_mm.ckpt.ckpt file is 1.5GB in size.
In which directory should the v3_sd15_mm.ckpt.ckpt file be placed within the ComfyUI structure?
The v3_sd15_mm.ckpt.ckpt file should be placed in the ComfyUI/models/animatediff_models directory.
Where can the basic workflow file for ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper be found?
The basic workflow file for ComfyUI-CameraCtrl-Wrapper can be found at https://github.com/chaojie/ComfyUI_CameraCtrl/blob/main/workflow/wf.json.
